data.message: I can deal with the changing of the newsfeed back and forth even though it's aggravating; however, the new results of the search feature at the top is TERRIBLE. JUST TERRIBLE.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Susan, but we appreciate your feedback. We're working hard to ensure that our updates improve Facebook for everyone. Let us know what would make it more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2evMId5. -Joe

Hi Nevenka. If you don't think you'll use Facebook again, you can request to have your account permanently deleted. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2evWrjy. -Neha
